timeline.message:
[Rust Server] Hyper 0.13 + Async/Await support

Upgrade dependencies to Hyper 0.13 and use async/await.

timeline.bodyText: This is an alpha release, mainly because the Hyper 0.13 code here is so new. I'll cut a 5.0 release of swagger prior to 5.0 of OpenAPI Generator being released, and update this to match.
timeline.author: richardwhiuk
